1.content: How do you come across Uma?
1.title: Pick your scenario

11.content:

When you got to the house, it blew you away. It wasn't just a house but an entire mansion. Maya leads the way and upon entering the house, you met a tall woman dressed in loose white clothing. Looking her up and down, she was beautiful. Her features just captured you, pieces like her nose and lips were amazing but her huge tan feet stole your heart.

You introduced yourself nervously but Uma gave you a smile, removing all stress you had. You ran off with Maya and had an amazing time like always but in your mind, you couldn't shake the image of her mother.

Hours when by and you two had been browsing the internet for cool stuff to buy and whatever was trending on youtube. Suddenly the computer shut off and you both had no idea what happened.

Maya says to go get her mom to help fix it, she was gonna see if she could fix it by herself.

You tell her take as long as she needs to reach it and she smiles at you. Again she reaches for the top, and her sole immediately makes contact with your face. Like an elevator, her sole goes up and down your face. You love every second of it and decide to stick your tongue out.

When she feels your tongue she says, "Naughty girl". Uma grinds her sole into your face and you plant lots of kisses. Uma stops reaching for whatever is at the top and turns 180 degrees. Acting like a gag, you deep throated her foot while being told "what a pathetic excuse for a girl, groveling at my feet... I'll enjoy having you around" for a minute before you ran off to Maya.
